#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, n, x, y, z, v1, v2, i, j, flag;
	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d", &n );
		scanf("%d %d %d", &x, &y, &z );
		v1 = 1000*x + 100*y + 10*z;

		flag = 0;
		for( i = 9;i >= 1;i-- ) {
			
			for( j = 9;j >= 0;j-- ) {
				
				v2 = 10000*i + v1 + j;
				if( ( v2 % n ) == 0 ) {

					printf("%d %d %d\n", i, j, ( v2 / n ) );
					flag = 1;
					break;
				}			
			}
			if( flag )
				break;		
		}

		if( !flag )
			printf("0\n");
	}

	return 0;
}
